intro:
Two people rather than playing alone
more than playing together
description:
Mini-games and difficulty will change depending on the stage!
Let's clear a lot of mini-games while cooperating or getting in the way.
After clearing all the stages, a brutal stage will be unlocked at the end...

From many unique characters
Find your favorite character.
And now... it's an adventure with friends!

◆Adventure at home
・From one person to four people

◆Adventure with everyone
・ Play with friends (friend matching)
・ Play with someone (random matching)

◆ Mini game
・Survive randomly generated maps
 Sometimes you can hit your friends to save them♪
・Giant rocks and barrels will roll
 Jump to avoid it!" Hit back with a punch!
・ Find the difference will be held in the castle
 What's the difference between the first castle and the second castle?
・Pinball at a high place? golf? Roll the big ball!?
 Let's carry a selfish ball that doesn't fly as expected♪
・Let's run through the dangerous ocean by boat
 Sharks, sunken ships, and even tornadoes!?

◆ game
・All 30 stages
・Let's overcome high difficulty with friends
・Co-op play
・There is a hidden element
・Do everything from start to finish

We are looking for brave men who can clear all stages!

"Have more fun tomorrow"
